resp = client.indices.create(
    index="new_index",
    mappings={
        "properties": {
            "query": {
                "type": "percolator"
            },
            "body": {
                "type": "text"
            }
        }
    },
)
print(resp)

resp1 = client.reindex(
    refresh=True,
    source={
        "index": "index"
    },
    dest={
        "index": "new_index"
    },
)
print(resp1)

resp2 = client.indices.update_aliases(
    actions=[
        {
            "remove": {
                "index": "index",
                "alias": "queries"
            }
        },
        {
            "add": {
                "index": "new_index",
                "alias": "queries"
            }
        }
    ],
)
print(resp2)
